alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, west central Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highlands, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Pasadena, Baytown, La Porte, Deer Park, Seabrook, Webster, Beach City, Highlands, Clear Lake, Channelview, Barrett, Cloverleaf, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Shoreacres, Morgan`s Point, The Johnson Space Center, San Jacinto State Park and Sheldon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris
